194664.<center>我が 霊廟に仕掛けし謎に挑み\nよくぞ ここまで たどり着いた…:
How did you manage to get this far, after all
the riddles you've set up in my tomb?

194665.<center>扉の先で待つのは 財宝の守護者ぞ……。\nさあ 最後の謎を 解き:
Beyond the passage awaits the guardian of the
treasure, now unravel the final riddle and
take possession of the hidden treasure!

228263.<center>扉の先で そなたを迎え撃つは\n霊廟を護りし 秘宝の使い魔たちの:
The vindictive thoughts of the Famililar of
the Treasure Horror who guarded the tomb will
greet you at the door...

228265.<center>さあ 最後の謎を 解き明かし\n隠されし財宝を 手に入れてみせよ:
Now, let's solve the last riddle and get our
hands on the hidden treasure...!
